cold_chain_pharma_compliance|Shipments|R: text. Unique shipment record key. PK. Example: CC381686.
cold_chain_pharma_compliance|Shipments|L: timestamp. Log-creation timestamp for this record. **NULL means record creation time not captured.**. Example: 2025-01-29T16:01:15.
cold_chain_pharma_compliance|Shipments|S: text. Human-friendly shipment token (unique within system). Example: SH88875.
cold_chain_pharma_compliance|Products|Pr: text. Unique product code. PK. Example: PH75271.
text. Commercial product label. Example: strategize value-added deliverables.
text. Product category or therapeutic class. Possible values: Biologics, Blood Products, Insulin, Vaccines.
cold_chain_pharma_compliance|Products|Ma: text. Manufacturer name. **NULL means manufacturer not specified.**. Example: York Ltd.
cold_chain_pharma_compliance|ProductBatc: text. Unique production batch identifier. PK. Example: BT909380.
text. Product code this batch belongs to. FK to Products.
timestamp. Manufacturing timestamp for the batch. Example: 2-Aug-24.
timestamp. Expiry timestamp for the batch. Example: 09/30/2026.
text. Textual description of required storage conditions. Possible values: -20°C, -70°C, 15-25°C, 2-8°C.
real. Minimum allowable temperature (°C). Possible values: -70, -20, 2, 15.
text. Temperature-sensing method or device type. Possible values: High, Low, Medium.
text. Packaging type for the shipment units. Possible values: Ampoule, Container, Syringe, Vial.
bigint. Number of saleable packs in the batch. Example: 936.
text. Declared commercial value in USD. Example: $57,421.85 .
real. Insurance coverage value in USD. **NULL means no insurance value set.**. Example: 226483.74.
cold_chain_pharma_compliance|Carriers|Ca: text. Unique carrier identifier. PK. Example: Rodriguez, Mcintyre and Richards.
text. Certification credentials or licence ID. **NULL means certification information unavailable.**. Possible values: Both, CEIV Pharma, GDP.
cold_chain_pharma_compliance|Vehicles|Ve: text. Unique vehicle reference identifier. PK. Example: VH6122.
cold_chain_pharma_compliance|Vehicles|Ca: text. Carrier identifier to which the vehicle belongs. FK to Carriers.
cold_chain_pharma_compliance|Vehicles|Ve: text. Vehicle type (e.g., van, truck, reefer). Possible values: Aircraft, Container, Reefer Truck, Van.
cold_chain_pharma_compliance|Vehicles|ve: text. Qualitative vehicle qualification/status. Possible values: Qualified, Under Review, Validated.
cold_chain_pharma_compliance|Vehicles|TE: text. Temperature-monitoring system installed. Possible values: Continuous, Interval, Manual.
cold_chain_pharma_compliance|MonitoringD: text. Unique monitoring-device reference. PK. Example: MD9886.
timestamp. Timestamp of last calibration. Example: 2024/10/6.
bigint. Recording interval in minutes. **NULL means interval not configured.**. Possible values: 5.0, 10.0, 15.0, 30.0.
bigint. Number of temperature points that can be stored. Example: 891.
cold_chain_pharma_compliance|Environment: text. Shipment record key this monitoring pertains to. PK. FK to Shipments.
text. Monitoring-device reference. FK to MonitoringDevices.
cold_chain_pharma_compliance|QualityComp: text. Shipment record key for QC. PK. FK to Shipments.
cold_chain_pharma_compliance|IncidentAnd: text. Shipment record key for risk log. PK. FK to Shipments.
cold_chain_pharma_compliance|InsuranceCl: text. Shipment record key for insurance. PK. FK to Shipments.
text. Indicator whether a claim is required. Possible values: No, Under Review, Yes.
text. Current claim status. **NULL means claim not initiated.**. Possible values: Approved, Filed, Rejected.
real. Amount claimed in USD. Example: 79419.22.
real. Total cost impact in USD. Example: 47835.32.
text. Responsible party for loss. **NULL means not yet assigned.**. Possible values: Carrier, Receiver, Shipper, Unknown.
cold_chain_pharma_compliance|ReviewsAndI: text. Shipment record key for review. PK. FK to Shipments.
text. Process improvement actions. Possible values: In Progress, No, Yes.
text. Training needs identified. Possible values: No, Under Review, Yes.
text. SOP updates required. Possible values: No, Under Review, Yes.
text. Impact on vendor performance. **NULL means none recorded.**. Possible values: Disqualification, Warning.
text. Changes for next shipment. **NULL means none planned.**. Possible values: Major, Minor.
text. Monitoring-frequency changes. Possible values: Decreased, Increased, No Change.
text. Route risk reassessment outcome. Possible values: Completed, Not Required, Required.
text. Packaging specification revision. Possible values: Completed, Not Required, Required.
text. Transport lane quality status. **NULL means status not set.**. Possible values: Invalid, Review Required, Valid.
text. Planned technology upgrades. Possible values: No, Under Evaluation, Yes.
text. Cost-optimisation opportunities. **NULL means none identified.**. Possible values: High, Low, Medium.
text. Sustainability impact assessment. **NULL means not assessed.**. Possible values: Negative, Neutral, Positive.
real. Estimated carbon footprint in kg CO₂-e. **NULL means footprint not calculated.**. Example: 2617.3.
text. Energy efficiency score. **NULL means score not set.**. Example: 81.0.
text. Review document format. Possible values: Electronic, Hybrid, Paper.
text. Data integrity verification status. Possible values: Compromised, Under Review, Verified.
text. Audit-trail completeness status. Example: 91.0.
text. Electronic-signature compliance status. Possible values: Invalid, Not Required, Valid.
text. System access-control status. Possible values: Adequate, Compromised, Limited.
text. Data backup status. **NULL means backup not confirmed.**. Possible values: Current, Failed, Pending.
text. Report generation status. Possible values: Completed, In Progress, Pending.
text. Distribution list details. Possible values: Extended, Limited, Standard.
text. Archiving status for review records. Possible values: Completed, Not Required, Pending.
text. Free-text review notes. Example: Agent usually ten food focus. Throughout return mean..
timestamp. Scheduled timestamp for next review. Example: 2025/3/13.
text. Review closure status. Possible values: Closed, Open, Under Review.
cold_chain_pharma_compliance|ShipSensorL: text. Shipment record key in link. PK. FK to Shipments.
text. Monitoring-device reference in link. PK. FK to MonitoringDevices.

cold_chain_pharma_compliance|Shipments|s.column_meaning: JSONB column. Groups routing, timing and risk-performance metadata of a single cold-chain shipment so that dashboards can fetch a complete lane summary from one JSONB field.

origin.hub: text. Code of the originating logistics hub. Example: Gonzales-Lopez Facility.
origin.address:
text. Street-level origin address. Example: 0131 Johnson Station
New Tinatown, FL 65757.
origin.nation: text. ISO country code of origin. **NULL means country not provided.**. Example: Fiji.

destination.hub: text. Code of the destination logistics hub. Example: Williams-Aguilar Hospital.
destination.address:
text. Street-level destination address. Example: 7209 West Flats
East Tonya, OR 13658.
destination.nation: text. ISO country code of destination. **NULL means country not provided.**. Example: Bouvet Island (Bouvetoya).

route.route_string: text. Encoded string of planned route waypoints. Example: Fiji -> Bouvet Island (Bouvetoya).
route.risk_note: text. Qualitative notes on route-specific risks. Possible values: High, Low, Medium.

timing_performance.planned_eta_hrs: bigint. Estimated transit time in hours. Example: 27.6.
timing_performance.actual_duration_hrs: bigint. Actual transit time in hours. **NULL means actual hours not yet recorded.**. Example: 10.2.
timing_performance.end_time_ts: timestamp. Actual arrival timestamp. Possible values: 2025/2/19 08:29.
timing_performance.distance_km: bigint. Total kilometres travelled for the shipment. Example: 2608.

cold_chain_pharma_compliance|Environment.column_meaning: JSONB column. Consolidates all temperature, humidity, shock, light and tracking telemetry collected for a shipment into one JSONB object for faster rule-engine evaluation.

temperature.excursion_count: bigint. Count of temperature deviations beyond limits. Example: 4.
temperature.excursion_duration_min: bigint. Total minutes of temperature deviation. Example: 48.
temperature.alarm_count: bigint. Number of temperature alarm events. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5.

humidity.humidity_monitor: text. Humidity monitoring flag. **NULL means humidity was not monitored.**. Possible values: No, Partial, Yes.
humidity.avg_pct: real. Average relative humidity percentage. Example: 42.3.
humidity.excursion_count: bigint. Count of humidity deviations. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5.

light_and_shock.light_monitor_mode: text. Light-exposure monitoring flag. **NULL means light was not monitored.**. Possible values: Continuous, Periodic.
light_and_shock.shock_monitor: text. Shock-event monitoring flag. **NULL means shock was not monitored.**. Possible values: Active, Passive.
light_and_shock.shock_event_count: bigint. Count of shock events detected. Example: 5.

tracking.location_tracking_state: text. Location-tracking status indicator. Possible values: Active, Failed, Intermittent.
tracking.route_deviation_incidents: bigint. Number of route deviation incidents. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3.
tracking.unscheduled_stops: bigint. Count of unplanned stops. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5.
tracking.stop_duration_min: bigint. Total minutes spent in unplanned stops. Example: 55.

cold_chain_pharma_compliance|QualityComp.column_meaning: JSONB column. Bundles seal integrity, product/pack condition, documentation and regulatory checks plus release status into a single JSONB field for one-click quality-decision review.

security.seal_status: text. Security seal status. **NULL means seal status not captured.**. Possible values: Broken, Intact, Suspicious.
security.security_incident: text. Security incident notes. Possible values: 0, 1, 2.

product_integrity.product_intact_check: text. Product-integrity check result. Possible values: Conditional, Failed, Passed.
product_integrity.pack_condition: text. Packaging condition assessment. **NULL means packaging condition not assessed.**. Possible values: Compromised, Damaged, Good.
product_integrity.label_condition: text. Label condition assessment. Possible values: Clear, Damaged, Illegible.

documentation.documentation_complete: text. Documentation completeness status. Possible values: Complete, Incomplete, Partial.
documentation.certification_status: text. Certification status at reception. Possible values: Complete, Expired, Missing.

customs_and_regulatory.custom_clearance_status: text. Customs-clearance status. Possible values: Cleared, Delayed, Pending.
customs_and_regulatory.import_permit_status: text. Import-permit compliance status. Possible values: Not Required, Pending, Valid.
customs_and_regulatory.regulatory_compliance_status: text. Regulatory compliance status. Possible values: Compliant, Non-compliant, Under Review.

gdp_quality.sop_compliance: text. Standard operating procedure compliance status. Possible values: Full, Non-compliant, Partial.
gdp_quality.gdp_compliance: text. Good distribution practice compliance status. Possible values: Full, Non-compliant, Partial.
gdp_quality.quality_agreement_status: text. Quality agreement status with partners. Possible values: Active, Expired, Pending.
gdp_quality.quality_review_status: text. Quality review status. Possible values: Approved, Pending, Rejected.
gdp_quality.responsible_person: text. Responsible quality person. Example: Scott Alexander.
gdp_quality.quality_approval_ts: timestamp. Timestamp of quality approval. **NULL means approval pending.**. Example: 2025/1/23.

release.product_release_status: text. Product release status. Possible values: Quarantined, Rejected, Released.
release.release_ts: timestamp. Product release timestamp. Possible values: 2025/2/19.
release.quarantine_reason: text. Reason for quarantine if applicable. **NULL means product not quarantined.**. Possible values: Damage, Documentation, Temperature Deviation.

cold_chain_pharma_compliance|IncidentAnd.column_meaning: JSONB column. Combines stability review, deviation investigation, risk assessment, reporting and impact analysis for a shipment into one JSONB structure to support CAPA and pharmacovigilance workflows.

stability_and_quality.stability_data_review: text. Stability-data review summary. Possible values: Completed, Not Required, Pending.
stability_and_quality.stability_impact_assessment: text. Assessment of stability impact. **NULL means impact not assessed.**. Possible values: Major, Minor.
stability_and_quality.product_quality_impact: text. Product-quality impact summary. **NULL means impact not assessed.**. Possible values: Confirmed, Possible.

batch_decision.batch_release_decision: text. Decision on batch release. Possible values: Approved, Pending, Rejected.

deviation_investigation.investigation_status: text. Deviation investigation status. **NULL means investigation not started.**. Possible values: Completed, Ongoing.
deviation_investigation.corrective_actions: text. Corrective actions taken. **NULL means actions not defined.**. Possible values: Implemented, Pending.
deviation_investigation.preventive_actions: text. Preventive actions planned. **NULL means actions not defined.**. Possible values: Implemented, Planned.

risk.risk_assessment_status: text. Overall risk-assessment status. Possible values: Completed, Ongoing, Required.
risk.risk_level: text. Assigned risk level. **NULL means level not set.**. Possible values: High, Low, Medium.

reporting_notification.incident_report_status: text. Incident-reporting status. **NULL means report not filed.**. Possible values: Draft, Reviewed, Submitted.
reporting_notification.health_authority_notification: text. Health-authority notification status. Possible values: Completed, Not Required, Pending.
reporting_notification.authority_response: text. Authority response summary. **NULL means no response yet.**. Possible values: Acknowledged, Investigation.
reporting_notification.customer_notification: text. Customer notification status. Possible values: Completed, Not Required, Pending.
reporting_notification.customer_response: text. Customer response summary. **NULL means no response yet.**. Possible values: Accepted, Rejected.

impact.patient_impact: text. Assessment of patient impact. **NULL means impact not assessed.**. Possible values: Confirmed, Possible.
impact.market_impact: text. Assessment of market impact. **NULL means impact not assessed.**. Possible values: Limited, Significant.
impact.reputation_impact: text. Reputation impact statement. **NULL means impact not assessed.**. Possible values: Major, Minor.

fields_meaning.lessons_learned: text. Lessons learned documentation reference. Possible values: In Progress, No, Yes.
